name: Devious Strikes
effects: you gain additional Cunning Strike options
limits: Daze (cost 2d6): target makes a Constitution save or on its next turn can do only one of move, action, or bonus action
Knock Out (cost 6d6): target makes a Constitution save or is Unconscious for 1 minute or until it takes damage; repeats save at end of turns
Obscure (cost 3d6): target makes a Dexterity save or is Blinded until the end of its next turn

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/05-Character Classes (Continued) - Players Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
